Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.util

Class NetCodecs

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.NetCodecs
public class NetCodecs extends Object
NetBuf Codec utilities.

    • SIGNED_VAR_INT

      public static final PacketCodec<NetByteBuf,Integer> SIGNED_VAR_INT
      Version of PacketCodecs.VAR_INT that handles negative integers properly.

      Use PacketCodecs.VAR_INT for unsigned integers.

    • SIGNED_VAR_LONG

      public static final PacketCodec<NetByteBuf,Long> SIGNED_VAR_LONG
      Version of PacketCodecs.VAR_LONG that handles negative longs properly.

      Use PacketCodecs.VAR_LONG for unsigned longs.
